word_mean: 许多是寄生性的，可携带病原。具有医学意义的属有：蚤属(Cediopsylla)，角叶蚤属(Ceratophyllus)，栉头蚤属(Ctenocephalides)，栉眼蚤属(Ctenophthalmus)，细蚤属(Leptopsylla)，穿手蚤属(Diamanus)，角头蚤属(Echidnophaga)，松鼠蚤属(Hoplopsyllus)，单蚤属(Monopsyllus)，新蚤属(Neopsylla)，病蚤属(Nosopsyllus)，山蚤属(Oropsylla)，蚤属(Pulex)，洞蚤属(Rhopalopsyllus)，潜蚤属(Tunga)，客蚤属(Xenopsylla)

sentence.Network_en: He finds material at auctions, antique shops and flea markets.

sentence.Network_en: Collectors of Fifties kitsch should pop over to Brussels for the flea market.
sentence.Network_cn: 50年代庸俗艺术作品的收藏者应该到布鲁塞尔的跳蚤市场去看看。

sentence.Network_en: He headed back towards the flea market and was quickly swallowed up in the crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 他转身朝跳蚤市场走去，很快淹没在人群中。

...场。跳蚤市场（flea market）是欧美等西方国家对旧货地摊市场的别称。由一个个地摊摊位组成，市场规模大小不等。出售商品多是旧货、人们多余的物品及未曾用过但已过时的衣物等。而我们机构的跳蚤市场主要是提供摊位给同学们，让同学们报名参与，把自己或者别人的一些旧物品进行售卖，实现物品循环利用的环保意.

entry.def: A flea is a very small jumping insect that has no wings and feeds on the blood of humans or animals.

means.word_mean: 1. any wingless blood-sucking parasitic insect noted for ability to leap

sentences.en: Nothing must be done hastily but killing of fleas.

sentences.en: He that lies down with dogs must rise up with fleas.

sentences.en: When he came to ask for his job back, we sent him away with a flea in his ear.
